body:
Improve the way we set the path for the VisIt plugin target directory : we do not assume knowing about the "platform" name VisIt uses. This can be useful since xml2cmake may not set the visit.prefix path as expected.
So now the setting of VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR should be coherent with VisIt, which is a condition for this package to properly extend visit.
title: visit-silo: better sets VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR to fit VisIt dir struct
